l7:Property.l7:StringValue:
Override the HTTP connection and read timeout.
The Connection Timeout defines the maximum time (in milliseconds) the Gateway attempts to establish a TCP connection. If exceeded, the routing will fail.
The Read Timeout defines the maximum time (in milliseconds) allowed for response data (not necessarily the complete response) to be read for the outbound request. If exceeded, the routing will fail.

l7:ResourceSet.l7:Resource: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="**********************************************"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy gets executed whenever an OTK Cache * assertion is used."/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be modified in order to set default configuration values for caches that are introduced."/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="For each cache follow the example shown below:"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="- Add an 'All assertions must evaluate to true' assertion"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="- Check for the cacheID (name) and set values appropriately"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Look Up Customization *****"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Customizable hook for cache lookup. This is used by OTK Cache Handler as a policy fragment"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the value to be looked up"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntryAge - the max age in seconds for entries into this cache"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Store Customization *****"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Customizable hook for cache store. This is used by OTK Cache Handler as a policy fragment, and is called for REMOVE, STORE and FLUSH operations"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the given value for the cache identified by cacheID"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntries - the maximum number of entries allowed in the cache. entries into this cache"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntrySize - the maximum size in bytes allowable for the value"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> Max. number of entries for this cache (optional if a default value exists)
Max. entry age in seconds (optional if a default value exists)
Max. size for each entry (optional if a default value exists)
The message to be cached (required, must exist in the preceeding policy context)

l7:Property.l7:StringValue: Writes an item to cache with ID: cacheID with key: cacheKey. If the cache does not exist, one will be created. If the key exists, the existing item will be overwritten.
